name: BradyVerse
description:
I am a six teen year old game developer i develop some decent game like 2D Paint, space adventures and tiny quest. and much more this project took me about 3 or 4 moths to complete. this game includes enemy AI. multiplayer, online, join servers, talk to friends, pick up guns speeded around the map randomly, bounce pads, and much more items coming soon, like more realistic guns, item shops, customizable characters,  customizable maps, gun skin shop and point systems

 i hope you enjoy Bradyverse if you did enjoy my content please leave a review and a comment for feedback...

Movements - WASD -  Gun Fire_Left mouse clicker  - Dash_Shift - Switch Weapond_scroll down or up
